org.jerkar.tool

Class JkRunPlugins

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.tool.JkRunPlugins

  • public final class JkRunPlugins
extends java.lang.Object
    Set of plugins configured or activated in a JkRun.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends JkPlugin>
      T      		 get(java.lang.Class<T> pluginClass)
      Returns the plugin instance of the specified class loaded in the holding JkRun instance.
      JkPlugin get(java.lang.String pluginName)
      Returns the plugin instance of the specified name loaded in the holding JkRun instance.
      java.util.List<JkPlugin> getAll()
      Returns a list of all loaded plugins in the holding JkRun instance.
      boolean hasLoaded(java.lang.Class<? extends JkPlugin> pluginClass)
      Returns true if the specified plugin class has been loaded in the holding JkRun instance.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public <T extends JkPlugin> T get(java.lang.Class<T> pluginClass)
        Returns the plugin instance of the specified class loaded in the holding JkRun instance. If it does not hold a plugin of the specified class at call time, the plugin is loaded then returned.

      • get

        public JkPlugin get(java.lang.String pluginName)
        Returns the plugin instance of the specified name loaded in the holding JkRun instance. If it does not hold a plugin of the specified name at call time, the plugin is loaded then returned.
        Caution : this method may be significantly slower than get(Class) as it may involve classpath scanning.

      • hasLoaded

        public boolean hasLoaded(java.lang.Class<? extends JkPlugin> pluginClass)
        Returns true if the specified plugin class has been loaded in the holding JkRun instance.

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<JkPlugin> getAll()
        Returns a list of all loaded plugins in the holding JkRun instance.
